doom.driver: White House presses Iran to make deal, while ramping up military presence. US media reports that Trump has discussed attack options with advisers, and a strike could happen as early as Saturday.
doom.summary: Trump has reportedly discussed Iran strike options with advisers, with action possible as early as Saturday—while simultaneously moving more carriers into position and insisting Tehran make a deal. Meanwhile, South Korea just sentenced its former president to life in prison for martial law, Prince Andrew got arrested over Epstein connections, and OpenAI's former chancellor is warning nations they'll be "weaker and poorer" without AI. The Iran drumbeat gets louder by the day.

factors.name: Geopolitics
factors.detail: US reportedly discussing Iran strikes as early as Saturday while deploying additional carrier groups and conducting gunboat diplomacy.

dawn.driver: New sodium ion battery stores twice the energy and desalinates seawater.
dawn.blurb: BREAKTHROUGH BATTERY POWERS CLEAN WATER FUTURE
dawn.summary: While tensions simmer and trials unfold, a remarkable scientific breakthrough offers tangible hope: researchers have developed a sodium-ion battery that doubles energy storage while simultaneously purifying seawater into drinking water. This dual-purpose innovation addresses two of humanity's most pressing challenges—renewable energy storage and water scarcity—with a single elegant solution that keeps water inside the battery material instead of removing it.

factors.name: Science
factors.detail: Sodium battery breakthrough doubles energy capacity and desalinates water, solving two global challenges at once.

factors.name: Cooperation
factors.detail: US concludes Ukraine peace talks while exploring diplomatic paths, and Nigeria transforms Trump threats into military partnership.

factors.name: Human Spirit
factors.detail: 71-year-old dancer cast in Taylor Swift video proves creativity and opportunity transcend age.

factors.name: Environment
factors.detail: AI breakthrough could replace rare earth magnets in electric vehicles, reducing environmental mining impact.
